ygData.subject: Re: Please give me a reason to play
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack!  I find this very disturbing.  What is it exactly, about bards at the 30+ level, that makes them so godawful?  With dual wield and the ability to wear
ygData.messageBody:
Ack! I find this very disturbing. What is it exactly, about bards at the
30+ level, that makes them so godawful? With dual wield and the ability to
wear plate, I would think a bard could actually hold his or her own at least
as a fighter.

I suspect it's just powergamers not wanting a jack-of-all-trades, but the
characters who can do the most damage standing behind those who can take the
most beating. Ah well, one day I'll be level 50 too. And know what? So
will those guys.

Roop

-----Original Message-----
From: David Rubino <tigger@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:27 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Please give me a reason to play



Yikes . . . sounds like this game is one big chore to some people. Do
you guys do anything fun?

-Musil
